login.registration: Your organization must be registered before you can log in.
login.instructions.title: Login instructions:
login.instructions.step1.before: You must log in to an EUDI Wallet or to our
login.instructions.step1.noLink: You must log in to an EUDI Wallet using your smartphone.
login.instructions.step3: Select the LEAR credential obtained after the registration process.
login.qr.hint: Scan the QR with an EUDI Wallet or our Digital Wallet to log in
login.sameDevice.title: Login from the same device
login.sameDevice.switch: Can't scan the QR? Login from the same device
login.support.question: Having trouble logging in?
error.title: Authentication Error
error.message: An error occurred during client authentication.
